about_the_game:
Doodle Deities is a roguelike deck builder that is all about creating powerful synergies, discovering new treasures and unlocking bosses to play as. Never run out of content again with a simple editor that requires no programming and full Steam workshop integration. All the content in the game was made with the built in editors, thus anything can be changed!

Do you like moddable games? We do as well, we built two editors into the game. The normal editor for people with no programming knowledge which can add most kinds of content like cards, bosses or factions to the game. We got full steam workshop integration and anything you make can be used in multiplayer with your friends!

Then we got the advanced editor that can add anything to the game! The entire game was written in this editor, even the normal editor was written in this editor. Add new mechanics, add features to the normal editor or do a total conversion. Your imagination is the only limit here!

Multiplayer is built into the game, not only that but anything added in our normal editor will work in multiplayer. Play with your friends, lack a challenge? Add your own cards, your own bosses and your own treasures!

Not only did we add steam workshop support and a built in editor. We will also add daily runs, random runs and more. The team behind this game are really passionate about roguelike card games so we know what is important for players. Replayability and variation are two things we really strive for!

We love unlockables, so we made every boss in the game unlockable as a playable character! Have fun playing as the overpowered boss or struggle your way to a victory as the underpowered one.

Do you like roguelike games that give you rewards where you gain 5% to some stat? We don’t! All treasures and consumables have meaningful and varied effects. We don’t pride ourselves on having the most treasures, we pride ourselves on having unique and interesting treasures.

Doodle Deities comes with

  • Four playable factions

  • 360+ fully implemented cards.

  • 64+ consumables to try out

  • 64+ different treasures to be discovered

  • 36+ unique bosses to defeat and unlock

  • 120+ boss powers to unlock

  • Multiple difficulty levels so even the most hardcore player can be challenged.

  • Multiplayer

  • Simple editor to add content as a non programmer

  • Advanced editor to add content if you are a programmer

  • Full Steam workshop integration
